caption.p: Seasonal occurrence of selected viral diseases. Panel ( a) Arboviral infections (of the central nervous system)—cases due to California serogroup viruses, by month, United States, 1975–1993 (Reproduced from Koo et al. [ 130]). Panel ( b) Pneumonia and influenza mortality for 122 US cities, week ending April 6, 2013 (Reproduced from CDC [ 131])
